description.gold-silver:
Change user's type
to a move's type.
description.crystal:
Change user's type
to a move's type.
description.ruby-sapphire:
Changes the user’s type
into an own move’s type.
description.emerald:
Changes the user’s type
into a known move’s type.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The user changes
its type to match
the type of one of
its moves.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user changes its
type to become the
same type as one of
its moves.
description.platinum:
The user changes its
type to become the
same type as one of
its moves.

The user changes its
type to become the
same type as one of
its moves.
description.black-white:
The user changes its type to become the

description.black-2-white-2:
The user changes its type to become the
same type as one of its moves.
description.x-y:
The user changes its type to become the
same type as the move at the top of the
list of moves it knows.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The user changes its type to become the
same type as the move at the top of the
list of moves it knows.
description.sun-moon:
The user changes its type to become the same type
as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user changes its type to become the same type
as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:

description.sword-shield:
The user changes its type to become the same type
as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.

effect.full: User's type changes to the type of one of its moves, selected at random.  hidden power and weather ball are treated as normal.  Only moves with a different type are eligible, and curse is never eligible.  If the user has no suitable moves, this move will fail.
effect.shortEffect: User's type changes to the type of one of its moves at random.
